div.head: 心胸甲錯
div.div: scaly skin on the heart and chest

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: scaly skin on the heart and chest

sense.def: Illness Sign of a dry and rough skin in the region of the heart (i.e. stomach) and chest coming off as flakes. It feels thorny when touched and looks like fish scales. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry yi yi ren 薏苡人：韋丹治肺癰，心胸甲錯者，淳苦酒煮薏苡人令 濃，微溫頓服之 , “If wei elixir is used to cure lung obstruction-illness and scaly skin on the heart and chest , one boils yi yi ren in pure bitter wine until a dense liquid is left and ingests it once when it is slightly warm”.
